worminfo
  • Reference

RNAi clone mapping

RNAi clone mapping

rnai(identifier, format = "clone")

Arguments

identifier
Identifier
format
Identifier format (clone, gene, genePair, name, or sequence)

Value

tibble

Examples

rnai("ahringer384-III-6-C01")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>                   clone           gene sequence  name
#>                   <chr>          <chr>    <chr> <chr>
#> 1 ahringer384-III-6-C01 WBGene00004735 Y47D3B.7 sbp-1
rnai("ahringer96-86-B01")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>               clone           gene sequence  name
#>               <chr>          <chr>    <chr> <chr>
#> 1 ahringer96-86-B01 WBGene00004735 Y47D3B.7 sbp-1
rnai("GHR-11010@G06")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>           clone           gene sequence  name
#>           <chr>          <chr>    <chr> <chr>
#> 1 GHR-11010@G06 WBGene00004735 Y47D3B.7 sbp-1
rnai("orfeome96-11010-G06")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>                 clone           gene sequence  name
#>                 <chr>          <chr>    <chr> <chr>
#> 1 orfeome96-11010-G06 WBGene00004735 Y47D3B.7 sbp-1
rnai("sbp-1", format = "name")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>    name           gene sequence
#>   <chr>          <chr>    <chr>
#> 1 sbp-1 WBGene00004735 Y47D3B.7
#> # ... with 1 more variables: clone <chr>
rnai("WBGene00004735", format = "gene")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>             gene sequence  name
#>            <chr>    <chr> <chr>
#> 1 WBGene00004735 Y47D3B.7 sbp-1
#> # ... with 1 more variables: clone <chr>
rnai("Y47D3B.7", format = "sequence")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>   sequence           gene  name
#>      <chr>          <chr> <chr>
#> 1 Y47D3B.7 WBGene00004735 sbp-1
#> # ... with 1 more variables: clone <chr>
rnai("Y53H1C.b", format = "genePair")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 5
#>   genePair           gene sequence  name
#>      <chr>          <chr>    <chr> <chr>
#> 1 Y53H1C.b WBGene00000010 Y53H1C.1 aat-9
#> # ... with 1 more variables: clone <chr>
